text: I'm pretty sure those are meant to mean no. If there is a channel for it but users aren't active, maybe there is no interest. If you have something interesting to discuss, you'll have the best chances in that channel, I'd guess.

text: I remember there was some interest at some point in the past, but on this Slack messages are deleted after about two weeks so there's no trace of the old chat...
